turtle.back: Moves back by the given number of steps
turtle.back|param|steps: number of steps to move, eg: 1
turtle.forward: Moves the turtle for the given amount of pixels
turtle.home: Moves the turtle to the center of the screen
turtle.pen: Puts the pen down or up
turtle.setPosition|param|x: the horizontal position from 0 (left) to 4 (right), eg: 2
turtle.setPosition|param|y: the vertical position from 0 (top) to 4 (bottom), eg: 2
turtle.stamp: Stamps the image at the current turtle position
